===========================

## Setup

### Install Services

Make sure you have the following services installed. We recommend using [brew] and [nvm]. See the
[Recommended installs] section for more help installing.

1. [git]
2. [nginx]
3. [RethinkDB]
4. [node.js v4]
5. [ElasticSearch ~1.7]
6. [npm3]
7. [Babel 5]

### Install the Project
